tropicraft.encyclopedia_tropica.name: Encyclopedia Tropica
tropicraft.encyclopedia_tropica.tooltip: A sandy and slightly sun bleached book filled with useful information about the world around you
tropicraft.encyclopedia.category.foods.d: [WIP]: General Info about tropicrafts food goes here
[WIP]: General Info about tropicrafts drinks goes here
tropicraft.encyclopedia.category.world.d: [WIP]: General Info about tropicrafts world goes here
[WIP]: General Info about tropicrafts tribes goes here
tropicraft.encyclopedia.category.mobs.la: [WIP]: General Info about tropicrafts mobs that exist on land goes here
tropicraft.encyclopedia.category.mobs.wa: [WIP]: General Info about tropicrafts mobs that exist on water goes here
tropicraft.encyclopedia.category.tools.d: [WIP]: General Info about tropicrafts tools goes here
tropicraft.encyclopedia.category.armor.d: [WIP]: General Info about tropicrafts armor goes here
tropicraft.encyclopedia.category.scuba.d: [WIP]: General Info about tropicrafts scuba gear goes here
tropicraft.encyclopedia.category.beach_a: [WIP]: General Info about tropicrafts beach accessories goes here
[WIP]: General Info about tropicrafts nature goes here
tropicraft.encyclopedia.category.decor.d: [WIP]: General Info about tropicrafts decor goes here

tropicraft.encyclopedia.category.flowers: [WIP]: General Info about tropicrafts flowers goes here
[WIP]: General Info about tropicrafts shells goes here
tropicraft.encyclopedia.category.music.d: [WIP]: General Info about tropicrafts music goes here
tropicraft.encyclopedia.category.misc.de: [WIP]: General Info about tropicrafts misc goes here
tropicraft.encyclopedia.category.lovetro: General information about the love tropics event hosted by the tropicraft devs every year.
tropicraft.encyclopedia.ltinfo.desc:
Love Tropics is a yearly charity stream organized by Team Tropicraft to support tropical areas affected by natural disasters. Last year (2018), we raised over $35,000 for Team Rubicon!

Each year, we put the name of everyone who donated in this book to be immortalized for their generosity. Join us next year for a great time with your favorite Mojangstas, streamers, YouTubers, and mod developers!

Go to lovetropics.com for more info.
tropicraft.encyclopedia.encyclopedia.des: This book is the source for information about the Tropics many items. Having been printed with magical ink, the book writes itself as you acquire the item. What awaits is for you to find out!
tropicraft.encyclopedia.fruit.title: Fruit's
tropicraft.encyclopedia.fruit.desc: [WIP] Tropicraft holds many new and wonderful fruits for you to eat or mix up in a drink to make a stunning cocktail
tropicraft.encyclopedia.lemon.title: Lemon
tropicraft.encyclopedia.lemon.desc: Tasty lemon citrus fruit that drops from Lemon leaves.
tropicraft.encyclopedia.lime.title: Lime
tropicraft.encyclopedia.lime.desc: Tasty lime citrus fruit that drops from Lime leaves.
tropicraft.encyclopedia.orange.title: Orange
tropicraft.encyclopedia.orange.desc: Tasty orange citrus fruit that drops from Orange leaves.
tropicraft.encyclopedia.grapefruit.title: Grapefruit
tropicraft.encyclopedia.grapefruit.desc: Tasty grapefruit citrus fruit that drops from Grapefruit leaves.
tropicraft.encyclopedia.coconut.title: Coconut
tropicraft.encyclopedia.coconut.desc: Coconuts grow on the palm trees of the Tropics. By hitting them with a sword you can get coconut chunks which make a great snack. Their hard shell fragments easily, making them great for explosives.
tropicraft.encyclopedia.coconutchunks.de: You can get this tasty treat by smacking a coconut with a sword. Combined with a pineapple and bamboo mug, you can make a refreshing pina colada.
tropicraft.encyclopedia.froglegs.title: Frog Legs
tropicraft.encyclopedia.froglegs.desc: The legs of the passive tree frogs are actually edible, however, they need to be cooked first.
tropicraft.encyclopedia.froglegscooked.d: This rare delicacy is the result of cooking frog legs.
tropicraft.encyclopedia.marlinmeat.title: Fresh Marlin
tropicraft.encyclopedia.marlinmeat.desc: Flesh of the elusive marlin. Cook this to get Seared Marlin.
tropicraft.encyclopedia.marlincooked.des: Mmmm. Yummy in my tummy. This is what you get when you cook Fresh Marlin.
tropicraft.encyclopedia.pineapple.title: Pineapple
tropicraft.encyclopedia.pineapple.desc: Typically found within the tropics, pineapples can also be found within the overworlds jungles in small patches. Since it is easily sustainable, the pineapple makes a great source of food.
tropicraft.encyclopedia.pineapple.desc2: If you slash them on the stem with a sword, you will receive pineapple cubes. Combined with a bamboo mug and coconut chunks, you can make yourself a refreshing pina colada.
tropicraft.encyclopedia.pineapplecubes.d: This great food source can easily be obtained by slashing a pineapple with a sword.
tropicraft.encyclopedia.toastednori.desc: [WIP] A Common delicacy of the koa people, gathered during the daily fish hunt.
Can be obtained by gathering sea grass from the sea floor and cooking it within a furnace
tropicraft.encyclopedia.seaurchinroe.des: Sea Urchin Eggs. Excellent source of Omega-3 fatty acids. That's all you need to know.
tropicraft.encyclopedia.rayraw.title: Raw Spotted Eagle Ray
tropicraft.encyclopedia.rayraw.desc: Spotted eagle rays are a rare sight in the tropics, but their smooth motions are as majestic as they are mesmerizing. You can kill one to get this raw fish, but...they're beautiful creatures, why would you??
tropicraft.encyclopedia.raycooked.title: Cooked Spotted Eagle Ray
tropicraft.encyclopedia.raycooked.desc: A delicacy in some cultures, this light fish meat is what you get when you cook Raw Ray.
tropicraft.encyclopedia.bamboomug.title: Bamboo Mug
tropicraft.encyclopedia.bamboomug.desc: Bamboo mugs are great for holding tropical drinks. Why don't you find a pineapple and coconut and make yourself a refreshing Pina Colada.
tropicraft.encyclopedia.pinacolada.title: Pina Colada
tropicraft.encyclopedia.pinacolada.desc: This refreshing drink is made by mixing pineapples and coconut chunks in a bamboo mug. Watch out though, monkeys enjoy pina coladas just as much as you do.
tropicraft.encyclopedia.coconut_water.de: [WIP] Simple but refreshing drink of coconut Water
tropicraft.encyclopedia.lemonade.title: Lemonade
tropicraft.encyclopedia.orangeade.title: Orangeade
tropicraft.encyclopedia.limeade.title: Limeade
tropicraft.encyclopedia.mai_tai.title: Mai Tai
tropicraft.encyclopedia.mai_tai.desc: [WIP] A staple at any Koa party, the lime and orange blend nicely with the Koa's secret rum stash.
tropicraft.encyclopedia.blackcoffee.desc: Who doesn't like coffee? Brew yourself a nice cup o' joe and watch the sunrise from your bungalow.
tropicraft.encyclopedia.caipirinha.title: Caipirinha
tropicraft.encyclopedia.caipirinha.desc: Though the Koa are not too fond of this citrusy drink, the lime and sugarcane that comprise it complement any beautiful sunset in the tropics.
tropicraft.encyclopedia.mixer.title: EIH Mixer
tropicraft.encyclopedia.mixer.desc: Mix various types of fruits with this to get different cocktails. You could have your own bar!
tropicraft.encyclopedia.sifter.title: Sifter
tropicraft.encyclopedia.sifter.desc: Right click a sifter with a any kind of sand, wait about ten seconds, and out will pop up to three items. It could be rare shells, gold nuggets, or more!
tropicraft.encyclopedia.aircompressor.de: Fill up your tanks and go exploring the oceans of Tropica, even try some cave diving but be wary about your oxygen level!
tropicraft.encyclopedia.scale_armor.desc: Armor made out of iguana scales provide fire resistance for whomever wears them
tropicraft.encyclopedia.scaleboots.title: Scale Boots
tropicraft.encyclopedia.scaleboots.desc: Boots made out of iguana scales that provide fire resistance for whomever wears them
Chestplate mesh of iguana scales that provides fire resistance for whomever wears it
tropicraft.encyclopedia.scalehelm.title: Scale Helmet
tropicraft.encyclopedia.scalehelm.desc: Helmet made of iguana scales that provides fire resistance for whomever wears it
tropicraft.encyclopedia.scaleleggings.de: Leggings made of iguana scales that provide fire resistance for whomever wears them
tropicraft.encyclopedia.fire_armor.entry: [WIP: MAY NEED TO BE UPDATED]Armor constructed of an unknown material that gains durability when in fire, but don't stand in the fire too long, or you will be burned!
tropicraft.encyclopedia.fire_armor.craft: By throwing scale armor into a volcano, the armor starts to burn away and leaves behind armor born from the fire.
tropicraft.encyclopedia.fireboots.title: Fire Boots
tropicraft.encyclopedia.fireboots.desc: Boots constructed of an unknown material that gains durability when in fire, but don't stand in the fire too long, or you will be burned!
tropicraft.encyclopedia.firechestplate.d: Chestplate constructed of an unknown material that gains durability when in fire, but don't stand in the fire too long, or you will be burned!
tropicraft.encyclopedia.firehelm.title: Fire Helmet
tropicraft.encyclopedia.firehelm.desc: Helmet constructed of an unknown material that gains durability when in fire, but don't stand in the fire too long, or you will be burned!
tropicraft.encyclopedia.fireleggings.des: Leggings constructed of an unknown material that gains durability when in fire, but don't stand in the fire too long, or you will be burned!
tropicraft.encyclopedia.thetribe.title: The Tribe
tropicraft.encyclopedia.thetribe.desc: Upbeat tropical vibes brought to you by Emile van Krieken. Listen to this song while venturing through a Koa Village and you may find yourself a favorite among the villagers.
tropicraft.encyclopedia.tradewinds.title: Tradewinds
tropicraft.encyclopedia.tradewinds.desc: A chillout song produced by Frox. At 136 bpm, Trade winds is sure to help you relax during your tropical vacation.
tropicraft.encyclopedia.summering.title: Summering
tropicraft.encyclopedia.summering.desc: Downtempo summery vibes carefully crafted by Billy Christiansen. Pop a squat, craft a pina colada, and listen to this song to enhance your tropical relaxation experience.
tropicraft.encyclopedia.lowtide.title: Low Tide
tropicraft.encyclopedia.lowtide.desc: Produced by Punchaface, this chilled electronica track has a heavy bassline-driving melody and is sure to brighten any day in the tropics.
tropicraft.encyclopedia.easternisles.des: This awesome drum and bass track was produced by Frox. Kick back and enjoy.
tropicraft.encyclopedia.fishingrod.title: Bamboo Fishing Rod
tropicraft.encyclopedia.fishingrod.desc: A must have tool for any budding fisherman, this rod has a light weight feel and an ergonomic design that makes fishing for supper a breeze!
tropicraft.encyclopedia.snaretrap.title: Snare Trap
tropicraft.encyclopedia.snaretrap.desc: This device is used for trapping mobs and players, rendering them immobile.
tropicraft.encyclopedia.fishbucket.title: Fish in a Bucket
tropicraft.encyclopedia.fishbucket.desc: Use this to place the fish that you catch in the wild. Make an aquarium, perhaps!
tropicraft.encyclopedia.fishingnet.title: Fishing Net
tropicraft.encyclopedia.fishingnet.desc: This sturdy net is great for picking up the small fish that inhabit the Tropics. Be sure to have a water bucket, or you won't have anywhere to place you fish.
tropicraft.encyclopedia.fishingnet.desc2: [WIP] Such tool is traded by the koa villagers for some pearls
tropicraft.encyclopedia.dagger.title: Koa Dagger
tropicraft.encyclopedia.dagger.desc: Weilded by the Koa tribe when hunting or when attacked.
tropicraft.encyclopedia.dagger.desc2: Quite a fast weapon but not the most damaging weapon
tropicraft.encyclopedia.dart.title: Dart
tropicraft.encyclopedia.dart.desc: This neurotoxin-laced dart is capable of stopping most mobs in their tracks. Be careful though, the effect is only temporary. Darts can have varying potion effects associated with them.
tropicraft.encyclopedia.coconutbomb.desc: This explosive coconut is great for taking out anyone, or anything, that tries to get in your way.
[Note: Only can be used by people who have OP powers on a server!] $(wipdesc)
tropicraft.encyclopedia.blowgun.title: Blow Gun
tropicraft.encyclopedia.blowgun.desc: This tube of bamboo is used to shoot neurotoxin-laced darts at your pray. You will be surprised how a far and fast you can shoot a dart with a hefty blow.
tropicraft.encyclopedia.bamboospear.desc: [WIP] Possible update to how this item works may come in the future.
This sharpened stick is extremely powerful when first crafted. Be warned though, the spear looses its sharpness quickly.
tropicraft.encyclopedia.waterwand.title: Water Wand
tropicraft.encyclopedia.waterwand.desc: This mysterious rod has the unique ability to absorb 1000 blocks of water. This property makes the Water Wand perfect for creating water free underwater abodes.
tropicraft.encyclopedia.fertilizer.title: Fertilizer
tropicraft.encyclopedia.fertilizer.desc: Fertilizer functions similar to bone meal, but also grows tropical flowers and fruit plants like pineapples.
tropicraft.encyclopedia.portalstarter.de: This item, made with enchanted azurite and zircon, forms a portal that can be used to teleport between the Tropics and overworld when right-clicked on a 3x3 flat square of sandstone filled with water inside.
tropicraft.encyclopedia.curare.title: Curare
tropicraft.encyclopedia.curare.desc: Mix various types of flowers together to make different types of curare, which can be used to make darts with all sorts of potion effects.
tropicraft.encyclopedia.curarebowl.title: Curare Bowl
tropicraft.encyclopedia.curarebowl.desc: Mix various types of flowers in this bowl to create different types of curare, which can be used to make darts with all sorts of potion effects.
tropicraft.encyclopedia.leafball.title: Leaf Ball
tropicraft.encyclopedia.leafball.desc: Leaf balls can only be obtained via a trade with a Koa tribe member. When you throw a leaf ball, as soon as it makes contact it disperses into many leaves.
tropicraft.encyclopedia.ponybottle.title: Pony Bottle
tropicraft.encyclopedia.ponybottle.desc: Always bring along a pony bottle on your long scuba dives. When you run out of air, a pony bottle will refill your air temporarily, allowing you to swim to the surface safely.
tropicraft.encyclopedia.scubaflippers.de: These flexible flippers come in two different colors: pink and yellow! You can glide around the tropics water effortlessly wearing these bad boys. Hint: Do a barrel roll!
tropicraft.encyclopedia.scubagoggles.des: This piece of the scuba suit allows you to not only view the values from your Dive Computer, but breathe air from the scuba tanks you're wearing.
tropicraft.encyclopedia.scubaharness.des: This complicated looking scuba chestplate allows you to wear a number of scuba tanks. Shift + right click the item to wear up to 2 scuba tanks!
tropicraft.encyclopedia.weightbelt.title: Weight Belt
tropicraft.encyclopedia.weightbelt.desc: The weight belt allows your scuba chestplate to keep you underwater.
tropicraft.encyclopedia.bcd.title: BCD
tropicraft.encyclopedia.bcd.desc: Short for "Buoyancy Compensator Device", the BCD helps get air from your tanks to your mouthpiece
tropicraft.encyclopedia.scubatank.title: Scuba Tank
tropicraft.encyclopedia.scubatank.desc: Scuba tanks hold all the air that you breathe while diving. Refill your scuba tanks in an air compressor block.
tropicraft.encyclopedia.regulator.title: Diving Regulator
tropicraft.encyclopedia.regulator.desc: This device regulates the pressure between the breathing gas and the diver. In other words, this thing helps you not go boom.
tropicraft.encyclopedia.trimix.title: Trimix Gas Mixture
tropicraft.encyclopedia.trimix.desc: A breathing gas consisting of oxygen, helium, and nitrogen. Trimix can be placed in an air compressor to fill a tank with trimix-infused air, allowing the player to stay underwater for much longer!
tropicraft.encyclopedia.divecomputer.des: A rare piece of tropics technology, the dive computer logs various values from your time underwater. After you've swam for an hour, hand your dive computer to a Koa for a surprise!
tropicraft.encyclopedia.snorkel.title: Snorkel
tropicraft.encyclopedia.snorkel.desc: With this you can dive deep into the crystal-clear blue waters of the tropical realm without fear of drowning! You can stay under water four times as long when wearing a snorkel!
tropicraft.encyclopedia.acai_vine.title: Acai Vine
tropicraft.encyclopedia.acai_vine.desc: Rotten branches that are growing from the ground that used to grow the acai fruit.
tropicraft.encyclopedia.acai_vine.crafti: Can be crafted into Purple Dye within a crafting bench.
tropicraft.encyclopedia.anemone.title: Anemone
tropicraft.encyclopedia.anemone.desc: This bleach white flower adds a nice innocent, calm color to the realm.
tropicraft.encyclopedia.anemone.crafting: Can be crafted into White Dye within a crafting bench.
tropicraft.encyclopedia.orange_anthurium: This strong orange colored flower has an red counterpart.
Can be crafted into Orange Dye within a crafting bench.
tropicraft.encyclopedia.red_anthurium.de: This strong red colored flower has an orange counterpart.
tropicraft.encyclopedia.red_anthurium.cr: Can be crafted into Red Dye within a crafting bench.
tropicraft.encyclopedia.bromeliad.title: Bromeliad
tropicraft.encyclopedia.bromeliad.desc: This exotic red flower thrives in the thick of rainforests among the tree frogs and moist conditions.
tropicraft.encyclopedia.bromeliad.crafti: Can be crafted into Red Dye within a crafting bench.
tropicraft.encyclopedia.canna.title: Canna
tropicraft.encyclopedia.canna.desc: This yellow-orange flower blends in well in the tropical realm, complementing the hard-hitting red of the red anthurium.
tropicraft.encyclopedia.canna.craftingde: Can be crafted into Yellow Dye within a crafting bench.
tropicraft.encyclopedia.commelina_diffus: Commelina Diffusa adds a pleasant blue to the landscape of the Tropics.
Can be crafted into Light Blue Dye within a crafting bench.
tropicraft.encyclopedia.crocosmia.title: Crocosmia
tropicraft.encyclopedia.crocosmia.desc: These fiery little flowers are like miniature suns resting on the ground.
tropicraft.encyclopedia.crocosmia.crafti: Can be crafted into Orange Dye within a crafting bench.
tropicraft.encyclopedia.croton.title: Croton
tropicraft.encyclopedia.croton.desc: Go ahead and try to figure out what color this is. I DARE you.
tropicraft.encyclopedia.croton.craftingd: You think this is a easy one to make a Dye for!?
tropicraft.encyclopedia.dracaena.title: Dracaena
tropicraft.encyclopedia.dracaena.desc: This interesting peach and green colored plant can be found only in the rainforest.
tropicraft.encyclopedia.dracaena.craftin: Can be crafted into Green Dye within a crafting bench.
tropicraft.encyclopedia.tropical_fern.de: Tropical Ferns can be found in rainforests throughout the realm.
tropicraft.encyclopedia.tropical_fern.cr: Its just a friendly neighborhood Fern.
tropicraft.encyclopedia.golden_fern.desc: Golden Leather Ferns can be found in Mangrove located close to the ocean side throughout the tropics.
tropicraft.encyclopedia.golden_fern.craf: They come in all different sizes!
tropicraft.encyclopedia.foliage.title: Foliage
tropicraft.encyclopedia.foliage.desc: Common greenery found in the tropics.
tropicraft.encyclopedia.foliage.crafting:
What is it called when a large piece of foliage is the same on both sides?
Symmetree.
tropicraft.encyclopedia.iris.title: Iris
tropicraft.encyclopedia.iris.desc: These tall purple flowers are quite a sight. They can easily be replanted.
tropicraft.encyclopedia.iris.craftingdes: Can be crafted into Purple Dye within a crafting bench.
tropicraft.encyclopedia.magic_mushroom.d: Found only in the rainforest, these mushrooms are mysterious, need to explore more.
tropicraft.encyclopedia.magic_mushroom.c: Can be crafted into Light Blue Dye within a crafting bench.
tropicraft.encyclopedia.orchid.title: Orchid
tropicraft.encyclopedia.orchid.desc: Orchids are perhaps the rarest of all the flowers in the Tropics. Their delicate pink and white petals are sure to add an air of sophistication to your home.
tropicraft.encyclopedia.orchid.craftingd: Can be crafted into Pink Dye within a crafting bench.
tropicraft.encyclopedia.pathos.title: Pathos
tropicraft.encyclopedia.pathos.desc: Pathos, in greek, means 'an appeal to emotions'. This plant can only be found in rainforests.
tropicraft.encyclopedia.pathos.craftingd: Can be crafted into Green Dye within a crafting bench.
tropicraft.encyclopedia.kapokleaves.desc: These leaves are found on humongous trees that appear on rare occasions in rainforest biomes
tropicraft.encyclopedia.palmleaves.title: Palm Leaves
tropicraft.encyclopedia.palmleaves.desc: These leaves are found on Palm trees located at the beaches of the overworld or scattered throughout the tropics
tropicraft.encyclopedia.palmlog.title: Palm Log
tropicraft.encyclopedia.palmlog.desc: Palm trees are made of a surprisingly sturdy wood. It can also be split into planks.
tropicraft.encyclopedia.palmsapling.desc: These shoots can only grow on sand. Like other trees, they grow best in wide open areas and benefit from the use of bone meal.
tropicraft.encyclopedia.mahoganylog.desc: This beautifully colored wood comprises all Tropicraft rainforest trees and make for a beautiful addition to any tropical paradise.
These Mahogany saplings can grow on any typical soil. Like other trees, they grow best in wide open areas and benefit from the use of bone meal.
tropicraft.encyclopedia.lemonsapling.des: Grows into a lemon tree. When live gives you lemon saplings, make...lemon trees?
tropicraft.encyclopedia.limesapling.desc: Grows into a lime tree. Pucker your lips, limes are sure to leave a crazy aftertaste once you grow the lime sapling into a full tree!
tropicraft.encyclopedia.orangesapling.de: Plant this orange sapling, and soon you will have a fully-bloomed orange tree! Punch orange leaves, get orange. ??? Profit!
tropicraft.encyclopedia.grapefruitsaplin: Grows into a grapefruit tree, where you can get yummy grapefruits from!
tropicraft.encyclopedia.reeds.title: Reeds
tropicraft.encyclopedia.reeds.desc: In the Tropics, sugar cane serves a new purpose: thatching.
tropicraft.encyclopedia.ashenmask.title: Ashen Mask
tropicraft.encyclopedia.ashenmask.desc: These masks are the source of an Ashen's identity. Without a mask, an Ashen is naked, fearful, and cowardly, while with one, they are perhaps the most agressive hunters in the Tropics. By wearing a mask, you are considered an Ashen. Masks can also be hung on walls for decoration. Be wary though, as a maskless Ashen will take the closest mask.
tropicraft.encyclopedia.azurite.title: Azurite
tropicraft.encyclopedia.azurite.desc: This soft mineral is actually an ore of copper. It owes it's pretty blue color to the weathering of copper ore deposits.
tropicraft.encyclopedia.bamboo.title: Bamboo Shoot
tropicraft.encyclopedia.bamboo.desc: Bamboo is by far the most versatile item in the Tropics. You can craft weapons, blocks, and mugs from this sustainable resource.
tropicraft.encyclopedia.bambooblock.desc: This easy-to-craft block is made from sustainable bamboo. Watch out, it isn't very strong.
tropicraft.encyclopedia.bamboochest.desc: A chest made out of bamboo! It will complete your tropical-themed shack!
tropicraft.encyclopedia.bamboodoor.title: Bamboo Door
tropicraft.encyclopedia.bamboodoor.desc: This bamboo and thatch door is perfect for separating you from the wilderness. Be careful though, this door isn't very strong.
tropicraft.encyclopedia.bamboofence.desc: This bamboo fence is great at keeping the bad things out. Careful though, this fence isn't very strong.
This bamboo fence gate works fantastic with fences of all types. Like other bamboo blocks, it isn't very strong.
tropicraft.encyclopedia.bamboostick.desc: A stick made of bamboo. Used in many tropical recipes to replace the use of sticks.
tropicraft.encyclopedia.beachchair.title: Beach Chair
tropicraft.encyclopedia.beachchair.desc: Ahhh. Cast your line into the warm blue ocean, watch as a school of fish slowly approaches, and do all of this in the luxury of a beach chair! Sit back and relax in a chair of one of sixteen colors.
tropicraft.encyclopedia.beachumbrella.de: A beach getaway is not complete until there is an umbrella to shade yourself with! Also comes in sixteen different colors.
tropicraft.encyclopedia.beachfloat.title: Beach Floats
tropicraft.encyclopedia.beachfloat.desc: These relaxing floats allow the gentle currents of the tropics to move you. They come in sixteen different colors.
tropicraft.encyclopedia.volcanicsand.des: Tread lightly on this sand...or don't at all. If you aren't wearing any scale or fire armor, you better be ready to run reaaaaaaaaally fast.
tropicraft.encyclopedia.chunkohead.title: Chunk O' Head
tropicraft.encyclopedia.chunkohead.desc: The Easter Island Heads that can occasionally be seen are made up of this rock. It is a holy stone to those who built the Heads, and taking it is considered sacrilege.
tropicraft.encyclopedia.chunkfence.title: Chunk O' Head Fence
tropicraft.encyclopedia.chunkfence.desc: The Easter Island Heads that can occasionally be seen are made up of this rock. Surround your base with a lovely fence version of the block.
tropicraft.encyclopedia.chunkfencegate.d: The Easter Island Heads that can occasionally be seen are made up of this rock. This fence gate works wonderfully with all fence types.
tropicraft.encyclopedia.coffeebean.title: Coffee Bean
tropicraft.encyclopedia.coffeebean.desc: The pit inside the red or purple fruit often referred to as a cherry. This is the seed for the coffee plants found throughout the tropics.
tropicraft.encyclopedia.coralsand.title: Coral Sands
tropicraft.encyclopedia.coralsand.dec: It is rumored that hundreds of years ago, these coral sands were washed ashore during a tornado.
tropicraft.encyclopedia.eudialyte.title: Eudialyte
tropicraft.encyclopedia.eudialyte.desc: This pink-ish colorful crystal can be found when you mine Eudialyte ore, which is found underground in the tropicraft realm. It is a great material for tools.
tropicraft.encyclopedia.flowerpot.title: Flower Pot
tropicraft.encyclopedia.flowerpot.desc: This flower pot can be used to beautify any garden by holding any tropical flower, plant, or sapling
tropicraft.encyclopedia.frogskin.title: Poison Frog Skin
tropicraft.encyclopedia.frogskin.desc: Poisonous tree frogs secrete a paralyzing toxin though their skin. By combining this with darts, you can briefly paralyze an enemy.
tropicraft.encyclopedia.froxconch.title: Frox Conch
tropicraft.encyclopedia.froxconch.desc: Named after the creator of Tropicraft's theme song "Trade Winds", the Solonox shell yields a chance of finding a black or white pearl inside, so be on the lookout!
tropicraft.encyclopedia.foamysand.title: Green Sands
tropicraft.encyclopedia.foamysand.desc: This rare sand is rumored to have formed long ago when the Tropics were first emerging from the depths of the ocean and is most commonly found below patches of seaweed.
tropicraft.encyclopedia.iggyscale.title: Iguana Scale
tropicraft.encyclopedia.iggyscale.desc: The adorable iguanas that inhabit the tropics drop scales. What is unique about these scales is that they are fire retardant. Wearing armor made of scales will allow you venture into some pretty hot places.
tropicraft.encyclopedia.iguana_leather.d: The adorable iguanas that inhabit the tropics also drop a green leather. This leather functions just like regular leather and can be used interchangeably. You can also make bongo drums with iguana leather!
tropicraft.encyclopedia.koachest.title: Koa Chest
tropicraft.encyclopedia.koachest.desc: A chest that spawns Koa. Use it to populate a village or bungalow!
tropicraft.encyclopedia.leather.title: Leather
tropicraft.encyclopedia.leather.desc: Leather is not only great for making stylish boots, it can also make flippers.
tropicraft.encyclopedia.fruitleaf.desc: [WIP] Can be obtained by punching one of the many fruit tree leaves found within the tropics. Note: may change within the future
tropicraft.encyclopedia.coral.title: Coral
tropicraft.encyclopedia.coral.desc: While these bioluminescent lifeforms are at home in the ocean, they are well suited for lighting up an aquarium.
tropicraft.encyclopedia.mahoganyfence.de: This beautifully colored wood comprises all Tropicraft rainforest trees and make for a beautiful addition to any tropical paradise.
tropicraft.encyclopedia.mahoganyfencegat: This beautifully colored wood comprises all Tropicraft rainforest trees and make for a beautiful addition to any tropical paradise.
tropicraft.encyclopedia.mineralsand.desc: This special type of sand is rumored to contain various minerals. Their use is currently unknown.
tropicraft.encyclopedia.pabshell.title: Pab Shell
tropicraft.encyclopedia.pabshell.desc: Named after one of the original modders of tropicraft, Pablomittens, the Pab shell stands as one of the original items that was in tropicraft since v1.0, but was never given a use.
tropicraft.encyclopedia.palmplanks.title: Palm Planks
tropicraft.encyclopedia.palmplanks.desc: Palm planks come from palm wood which comes from palm trees!
tropicraft.encyclopedia.palmfence.title: Palm Fence
tropicraft.encyclopedia.palmfence.desc: Palm trees are made of a surprisingly sturdy wood. Its beautiful planks can create fences.
tropicraft.encyclopedia.palmfencegate.de: Palm trees are made of a surprisingly sturdy wood. Its beautiful planks can create fence gates.
tropicraft.encyclopedia.pearlb.title: Pearl, Black
tropicraft.encyclopedia.pearlb.desc: Has a very high trade value with the Koa tribe; found inside Frox conches on rare occasions.
tropicraft.encyclopedia.pearlw.title: Pearl, White
tropicraft.encyclopedia.pearlw.desc: Has a moderately high trade value with the Koa tribe; found inside Solonox shells.
tropicraft.encyclopedia.purifiedsand.des: Purified sand makes up the majority of the Tropics, with rare patches of special types of sand.
tropicraft.encyclopedia.rubenautilus.des: Named after one of the current modders of tropicraft, MrRube, the Rube Nautilus was actually made by MrRube before v1.0 of Tropicraft, but was never given a use...until now!
tropicraft.encyclopedia.smeltedzircon.de: If you have this, you are only 4 diamonds away from having zirconium.
tropicraft.encyclopedia.solonoxshell.des: Named after a nickname of the creator of Tropicraft's theme song "Trade Winds", the Solonox shell yields a chance of finding a black or white pearl inside, so be on the lookout!
tropicraft.encyclopedia.starfishshell.de: A starfish-shaped shell that drops when you kill a starfish. Placeable on walls.
tropicraft.encyclopedia.tikitorch.title: Tiki Torches
tropicraft.encyclopedia.tikitorch.desc: These tall torches are great for lighting up beaches.
tropicraft.encyclopedia.thatchblock.desc: As easy to craft as it is to break, the thatch block provides another sustainable building material to Tropics. It can be crafted into stairs and slabs.
tropicraft.encyclopedia.thatchfence.desc: As easy to craft as it is to break, the thatch block provides another sustainable building material to Tropics.
As easy to craft as it is to break, the thatch block provides another sustainable building material to Tropics.
tropicraft.encyclopedia.tropiframe.title: Tropicraft Item Frame
tropicraft.encyclopedia.tropiframe.desc: This item frame functions the same way as a vanilla item frame but has a bamboo border
tropicraft.encyclopedia.turtleshell.desc: This shell is great for sprucing up your beach bungalow.
tropicraft.encyclopedia.zircon.title: Zircon
tropicraft.encyclopedia.zircon.desc: This mystical red crystal can be mined from Zircon ores, which are found deep underground in the tropical realm.
tropicraft.encyclopedia.zirconium.title: Zirconium
tropicraft.encyclopedia.zirconium.desc: This rare crystal, when combined with azurite, is rumored to unlock ancient powers. It also can be crafted to make tools of mystical strength!
tropicraft.encyclopedia.bamboo_ladder.de: Clunk. Clunk. Clunk. Hear that? That's you, climbing up a ladder made out of bamboo.
tropicraft.encyclopedia.koa.fisherman.de: A friendly Koa, prefers to fish anything available in the sea, will take pearls for various fish meats. Right click with dive computer to try to receive trimix.
tropicraft.encyclopedia.koa.hunter.title: Koa Hunter
tropicraft.encyclopedia.koa.hunter.desc: A Koa always looking for their next great hunt on land, will take pearls for various land meats and materials. Right click with dive computer to try to receive trimix.
